page.title: 27Beversbrook Sports Facility
page.content:
Beversbrook Sports Facility was opened in 1998.Beversbrook is over 54 acres big and is full of sport pitches. Calne football team started in 2008 and they play there on Saturdays and Sundays .also Broad town colts play matches there on Sunday.They have a cinema there and they recently showed Arriety. At beversbrook they also do Cricket they have a team for adults and children.They really enjoy sports and dancing activites like zumba dancing for women on a Saturday morning.
Contribution by: Ewan East and Brandon Doman
